attributes.action: Stop the country I love being turned into a "Politically Correct Nanny State"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day the papers are filled with new stories that make normal people shake their heads in disbelief. Common sense goes a long way in this life. Unfortunately this Government won't let us use it, in case we hurt ourselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
